docs.snippet: The Atrium in Trump Tower includes some of the most expensive retail space on Fifth Avenue, and the expensive stores that lease the space report some of the highest sales per square foot in the United States.   The Atrium has experienced some shak...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Atrium in Trump Tower includes some of the most expensive retail space on Fifth Avenue, and the expensive stores that lease the space report some of the highest sales per square foot in the United States. The Atrium has experienced some shakeout during its first three years, however. According to Donald Trump, who owns the space in partnership with the Equitable Life Assurance Society of the United States, about ''15 to 20 percent'' of the 40 stores in the complex have closed or left since 1983. A typical suburban mall loses as many as one-third of its tenants in the first few years.

headline.main: HIGH RENTS, BUT HIGH SALES, TOO

docs.snippet: THE clients, who had just bought an apartment in Trump Tower, asked their designer, Allen Minars, to do something that was, perhaps, a little different; maybe something with some color. In retrospect, looking around their elegant but startling liv...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE clients, who had just bought an apartment in Trump Tower, asked their designer, Allen Minars, to do something that was, perhaps, a little different; maybe something with some color. In retrospect, looking around their elegant but startling living room, they admit they hadn't really known exactly what the result would be. Mr. Minars took his clients at their word, and rather than shopping in showrooms for predictable pieces, he decided to buy art furniture. The resulting apartment summarizes one of the latest and strongest trends in New York design, 1986: the chairs, tables, desks, cabinets and lights are all designed by artists as one-of-a-kind, signed pieces, with strident colors, odd shapes and angular profiles. Despite their individuality, they add up to a coherent look and a strong statement.

headline.main: APARTMENT OF THE MOMENT: THE LATEST IN TRENDS

docs.snippet: I got this because I wanted to add some razzle and dazzle to my glamorous evening gowns — something new and sexy. Several of my friends were actresses who adored Bob Mackie and always looked fabulous, so I felt I had nothing to lose. I remember ...
docs.lead_paragraph: I got this because I wanted to add some razzle and dazzle to my glamorous evening gowns — something new and sexy. Several of my friends were actresses who adored Bob Mackie and always looked fabulous, so I felt I had nothing to lose. I remember wearing it for one of my birthday parties. Yes, it’s very heavy, but nothing ever stops me from having a great time. In fact, that’s my slimming tip of the day: wear a heavy beaded dress and go dancing every night. You’ll have a fabulous time and lose a ton of weight. [?][?][?] IVANA TRUMP, AS TOLD TO BEN WIDDICOMBE.

byline.original: By IVANA TRUMP, AS TOLD TO BEN WIDDICOMBE
